content.html:
March 2025

The world could use a laugh. I invite you to join me in watching 1972’s “What’s Up Doc?” and post about it on your very own website.

Links about this movie: Wikipedia · IMDB · JustWatch · Letterboxd

What is this?

IndieWeb Movie Club is a monthly movie themed blog carnival!

Submitting your post

Once you’ve posted your post or watch or review, please share link from your own website.

You can share it by sending a webmention to this page.

You can share it by leaving a comment on this page.

You can share it by sending a message via my contact page.

You can share it via email joe@artlung.com.

And then

I will include a link to your post here. Happy watching!

Watches!

  1. Trovster.com
  2. Feadin.eu
  3. Sometimesigetbored.co.uk
  4. Sarajaksa.eu
  5. Zacharykai.net
  6. Benji.dog
  7. Gregorlove.com
